https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/eHmhChNYQLmlnNoH3ot8NJYOvzo.jpg A concert film documenting English pop rock band Coldplay's 2011-2012 'Mylo Xyloto' world tour, capturing their live shows at Paris's Stade de France, Montreal's Bell Centre, and Glastonbury Festival's Pyramid Stage. Coldplay: Live 2012
